verses.roman:
rāmānanda-rāya saba-gaṇe nimantrila
bāhira udyāne āsi' prabhu vāsā kaila

synonyms: rāmānanda-rāya—Rāmānanda Rāya; saba-gaṇe—all the followers of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nimantrila—invited; bāhira udyāne—in an outside garden; āsi'-coming; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vāsā kaila—made His resting place.
translation: Rāmānanda Rāya invited all the others for their meals, and Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu made His resting place in a garden outside the temple.
